content:
How do one deals with compatibility with <1.9 Julia versions while having a precompilation directives for >=1.9? (by means of PrecompileTools).

When the only difference between versions is the precompilation directives, it sounds suboptimal to release breaking versions for that.
Oh, it seems that precompilation broke some of my package tests, but not for the reasons I was thinking. So I'm not sure the question makes sense.
Leandro Martínez has marked this topic as resolved.
